ModMetaData.name: Simple Mining Extension
ModMetaData.author: WolfgangPolska/ Nero the Fam
ModMetaData.description: Minor expansion to mining on rimworld. Vanilla metals now have to be smelted from ores before they can be used. Buffed deep drills and added medieval drilling options. I have attached link to my google form about this mod. It wil help me enhance and shape my mod for it's users ( it means YOU!), so consider filling it. Enjoy!
